fsu.cs.alpha
Class KeyBuffer

java.lang.Object
  fsu.cs.alpha.KeyBuffer

public class KeyBuffer
extends Object

a global buffer to hold the keys as we read them in this is so we can commune between the UI thread which may read keys but can't mess with game stuff and the game thread which can not read from the keys but must know what they are we also put the ship speed from the tilt in here too
